unnormalised: Delivery services in Mumbai are facing some major challenges these days, especially in areas like Bandra and Andheri. Apparently, it's getting tougher and tougher to navigate the narrow lanes and manage deliveries on time, especially during peak hours. Pin code 400050, for example, has seen a spike in delivery delays.
normalised: Delivery services in Mumbai are facing some major challenges these days, especially in areas like Bandra and Andheri. Apparently, it's getting tougher and tougher to navigate the narrow lanes and manage deliveries on time, especially during peak hours. Pin code four double zero zero five zero, for example, has seen a spike in delivery delays.

unnormalised: Plus, with the monsoon hitting, things are only getting worse. Areas near Juhu Beach (postcode 400049) are often waterlogged, making it almost impossible for delivery guys to reach the customers. Even using bikes becomes a risky affair. They're really struggling to maintain their delivery schedules in these conditions.
normalised: Plus, with the monsoon hitting, things are only getting worse. Areas near Juhu Beach (postcode four double zero zero four nine) are often waterlogged, making it almost impossible for delivery guys to reach the customers. Even using bikes becomes a risky affair. They're really struggling to maintain their delivery schedules in these conditions.

unnormalised: One of the main problems is incorrect addresses. How many times have you ordered something and the delivery address is incomplete or just plain wrong? It happens all the time! Address like "Near XYZ store, Andheri" isn't enough; we need the full address including the building number and street name.
normalised: One of the main problems is incorrect addresses. How many times have you ordered something and the delivery address is incomplete or just plain wrong? It happens all the time! Address like "Near X-Y-Z store, Andheri" isn't enough; we need the full address including the building number and street name.

unnormalised: To top it off, many apartment complexes in areas like Powai (400076) have strict security protocols, making it time-consuming for delivery personnel to access the buildings. They have to go through multiple checks, and sometimes the customer isn't even available to receive the package right away. It’s a real bottleneck.
normalised: To top it off, many apartment complexes in areas like Powai (four double zero zero seven six) have strict security protocols, making it time-consuming for delivery personnel to access the buildings. They have to go through multiple checks, and sometimes the customer isn't even available to receive the package right away. It's a real bottleneck.

unnormalised: So, if you’re ordering something in Mumbai, especially during the monsoon, do everyone a favour and double-check your delivery address. Give clear and concise instructions, including the pin code, building number and any nearby landmarks. This will definitely help those delivery heroes!
normalised: So, if you're ordering something in Mumbai, especially during the monsoon, do everyone a favour and double-check your delivery address. Give clear and concise instructions, including the pin code, building number and any nearby landmarks. This will definitely help those delivery heroes!
